articles.title: European Union Unveils Climate Plan To Cut Emissions By 55% This Decade - NPR
articles.description: A sweeping proposal unveiled by the European Union on Wednesday would look to cut emissions of the gases that cause global warming by 55% by the end of this decade.
articles.content:
The European Union on Wednesday unveiled sweeping new legislation to help meet its pledge to cut emissions of the gases that cause global warming by 55% over this decade.
Virginia Mayo/AP

articles.title: EU unveils tough new climate rules, including tax on foreign polluters - CBC.ca
articles.description: The European Union is unveiling ambitious new climate change rules on Wednesday that will include forcing more emitters to pay for their carbon output, and forcing foreign companies to pay a levy for their carbon when they sell products into Europe.
